name: Jack Weller
description: Currently working on my Certificate III in Information Technology

projects.title: Chat Client
projects.description: This is  a clone of Discord using Firebase. It was a HTML file but I migrated it to React and Electron.

projects.title: BOM Website
projects.description: I redesigned the Bureau of Meteorology website because it's extremely outdated.

projects.title: BOM Radar GIF
projects.description: This uses the BOM FTP server to get radar images and stitches them together together into a GIF.

projects.title: NodeJS Maze
projects.description: This is a maze game that I made for a hackerthon. It runs in the CLI and is really inefficient.

projects.title: SkyGuessr
projects.description: This is a recreation of GeoGuessr but with locations from Hypixel Skyblock.

projects.title: Where is my Bus?
projects.description: This uses the translink API to show the location of buses in South East Queensland.
